ing: 1 medium mango, peeled and finely diced
1 jalapeno pepper, seeded and finely chopped
des: "This delicious salsa is perfect served with grilled chicken, pork, or fish over rice.  You can try different variations using different fruits (pineapple, apple, etc.)"
ins: Stir together mango, strawberries, kiwi, jalapeno, mint, and rum in a glass bowl. Refrigerate for 1 to 3 hours, stirring once or twice.
